qas.question: The Greek Monarchy was abolished when?
Who became the Greek leader in 1935?
The Greek monarchy was reestablished by who?
In what year did a coup take place and new dictatorship form?

context: Following the catastrophic events in Asia Minor, the monarchy was abolished via a referendum in <a0_0>1924<a0_0/> and the <a1_0>Second Hellenic Republic<a1_0/> was declared. <a2_0><a3_0>Premier Georgios Kondylis<a3_0/><a2_0/> took power in 1935 and effectively abolished the republic by bringing back the monarchy via a referendum in 1935. A coup d'état followed in <a4_0>1936<a4_0/> and installed Ioannis Metaxas as the head of a dictatorial regime known as the 4th of August Regime. Although a dictatorship, Greece remained on good terms with Britain and was not allied with the Axis.
